Summary: Metallic Object was hovering very high up, stationary not a satellite
divs: Sighting Details Walked out on the balcony and notice a metallic glinting object in the sky. First i thought it was a satellite but realized it was stationary(was using rooftop as a point of reference). after about 7ish minutes it just disappeared. No cloud cover.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Coral Springs
There were no other sightings in Coral Springs on or around January 24th 2012
